content.text: Hi, my name is John and I live in Dallas, TX. I'm a physical therapist and my wife is a school nurse. We have two children, a boy and a girl. They are 14 and 12 years old.

Hi, my name is Jane and I'm from Los Angeles, CA. I'm a filmmaker and I love to put a smile on people's faces. I also try not to think about death, and people sometimes worry that I'm crazy. I'm a bad liar, too.
What kind of filmmaking do you do?
I do a little bit of everything, but I mostly focus on documentary and short film. I love telling stories that make people laugh or cry or think.
That's great! I'm a big fan of documentaries. I like to learn about new things and see different perspectives.
Me too! I think it's so important to be open to new experiences and to learn from different people.
I agree. I think the world would be a much better place if we all did that.
I think you're right.
So, what are you working on right now?

I'm working on a documentary about the homeless population in Los Angeles. I've been volunteering at a homeless shelter for a few months, and I've been really inspired by the stories of the people I've met there.
That sounds really interesting. I'd love to see it when it's finished.
Thanks! I'll let you know when it's done.
Great! I'm looking forward to it.
Me too.
So, what are your favorite things to do in your free time?
I love to go to the movies, read, and hang out with my friends. I also like to travel and explore new places.
Me too! I love to travel and see new places. I've been to a few countries, but I'd love to travel to more.
Where have you been?
I've been to Mexico, Canada, and the United Kingdom. I'd love to go to Europe, Asia, and Africa someday.
Those sound like great places to visit. I've been to Mexico, Canada, and the United States. I'd love to go to Europe and Asia someday too.
Maybe we can travel together sometime.
That would be fun
